welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hewitt, a charming city known for its friendly locals and beautiful scenery. We invite you to explore and discover all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Draughon-miller Central Texas Regional Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Draughon-miller Central Texas Regional Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
